class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ffba">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cca8ff">darker </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">starless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">night </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cca8ff">morn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c4c8ff">black </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">Receptacle </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b084d0">Bode </xhtml:span><xhtml:span
